# Ephemeral: example_thing

Byline.

## Example Usage

```terraform
ephemeral "example_thing" "example" {
  name = "example"
}
```

## Argument Reference

* `name` - (Required) Name of thing.

## Attribute Reference

* `id` - Name of thing.
